Text: The Keygen does not Generate New Key - does not work

ok got it to work. 

Turn of internet.
Install RMC but do not run it
Start KeyGen, select Patch ... navigate to RMC install dir and select the aliccl file to patch.
Exit KeyGen, Run RMC

Works perfectly!

Follow the steps given above by phd1974 and then, when asked for the registration code, enter the serial number from the keygen. :)

Thanks for the torrent chami1988. But you should place a little note for noobs about app installation. Don't you think so ?
Thanks for directions marinasinger and phd1974.

#1: Just because he created a torrent for it doesn't mean he created the archive. He is not responsible for the lack of action by others.

#2: He doesn't owe you anything. Be glad he posted it and it's being seeded.

#3: It's not rocket science, and with just a teeny tiny miniscule amount of effort on your part, it would have been easy enough to figure out how to install it. Could have googled, could have looked at one of the other RMC torrents that does come with instructions.

Being a noob has nothing to do with it. Being selfish and lazy, demanding to be spoon fed even the simplest of things because of a highly misplaced sense of entitlement is. If you can't figure it out, and are so lazy that you can't be bothered to make any kind of effort to do so, then you are undeserving of reaping the rewards granted to those that do.
